features: 15-foot area of protection from mosquitoes and their bites.
4 warm LEDs create great ambiance in any setting.
Pole height is a maximum of 47 inches. Simply attach fewer pole pieces for a shorter height including landscape-style lighting.
No spray and no mess. Scent-free and DEET-free.
No heavy smoke, no open flames and no candles.
Mosquito repellent feature and lantern light can operate together or independently for maximum versatility.
This mosquito repellent torch is available at select retail partners with a one-piece pole (SKU: PSLT4D).
Package contains: 1 reusable LED torch, 5 pole pieces, 1 outdoor cap, and 12 hours of refills - 3 repellent mats and 1 fuel cartridge. Requires 3 AA-batteries (not included)
